template.name: virtual-ip
template.longdesc: Create a single primitive resource of type IPaddr2.

parameter.name: id
parameter.longdesc: Unique ID for this resoruce in the cluster.

parameter.name: ip
parameter.longdesc: The IPv4 address to be configured in dotted quad notation, for example "192.168.1.1".

parameter.name: netmask
parameter.longdesc: The netmask to be used (if unspecified it will be determined automatically).

parameter.name: lvs_support
parameter.longdesc: Enable support for LVS Direct Routing configurations. In case a IP address is stopped, only move it to the loopback device to allow the local node to continue to service requests, but no longer advertise it on the network.

template.crm_script: primitive ocf:heartbeat:IPaddr2 params ip= cidr_netmask= lvs_support=
